sailpoint.reporting.datasource

Interface JavaDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRDataSource, LiveReportDataSource, sailpoint.reporting.datasource.TopLevelDataSource

    public interface JavaDataSource
extends LiveReportDataSource
    This class allows a java datasource implement to be used with the GridReportExecutor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(SailPointContext context,
              LiveReport report,
              Attributes<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> arguments,
              java.lang.String groupBy,
              java.util.List<Sort> sort)
                throws GeneralException
        Used by the executor to pass the report definition arguments to the datasource.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Task Definition arguments for the report
        groupBy - Field name to group the report data by.
        sort - List of Sort objects definition the sort order on this report.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • setLimit

        void setLimit(int startRow,
            int pageSize)
        Parameters:
        startRow - Row number First row to start with in the resultset.
        pageSize - Number of rows to include in the result set, or zero to include all.
